content: Yeah, that makes sense. I think I'll definitely try to keep a dream journal and see if I can identify any patterns or themes. Lately, my dreams have been really vivid and emotional, and they often feel so real. Sometimes I wake up feeling really sad or anxious, and it takes me a while to shake off the emotions. Other times, I wake up feeling peaceful or comforted, like my loved ones are still with me. It's been really confusing, to be honest.
